籤詩版本二:
ʻO ka laina gula e kau ana i kou puʻuwai, ʻaʻohe emi, ʻaʻohe piʻi, ʻaʻohe kaumaha
He puʻuwai pololei kona i kona ola ʻana, a ua ʻālohilohi kāna mau ʻatikala a ua nani kāna hana kiʻi. He mea paahana ko Bei.
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ka puʻuwai mālie a pololei.
Paʻa nā mea a pau me ka pilikia ʻole.
解曰: Maluhia o ka manao a me ka pololei. I ka hopena, maluhia a mālie. E hahai wale i kāu hana. Ua maluhia ka honua.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Hoʻāʻo ʻo Jinjing iā Douer
Ua hana ʻo Dou Yanshan i nā hana maikaʻi a hōʻiliʻili i ka pono, a ua hānau ʻo ia i ʻelima mau keiki kāne, a ua lanakila lākou a pau. Ua makemake ke Akua e hoao i kekahi o kana mau keiki, o Dou Yi, a hoouna aku la i kekahi uhane gula i hoano e like me ke kaikamahine e hoowalewale ia Dou Yi, aka, aole nae o Dou Yi. lepo e loaʻa ai kahi ʻāpana gula.
(He mea hoʻohālike kēia moʻolelo no ka manaʻo o Dou Yi, ʻaʻole no ka hoʻowalewale moe kolohe.)
聖意: ʻO ka hale → Paʻa iā ʻoe iho → E ʻimi i ka waiwai → E noʻonoʻo i ka hana → Paʻa ka male → Hoʻohui iā Liujia → Kane hele wāwae → Loaʻa iā Xintian silkworms → Hoʻopaʻa holoholona → Loaʻa i ka poʻe me ka maluhia → Hoʻopaneʻe i ka hoʻopiʻi lehulehu → Holo maluhia → Mālama i ka waiwai nalowale → ʻIke i ka maʻi → Jingxingshan hale kupapaʻu → palahalaha
古人: Hoʻāʻo ʻo Jin Jing iā Douer
